\hypertarget{classASPGrammarBaseVisitor}{}\doxysection{ASPGrammar\+Base\+Visitor$<$ Result $>$ Class Template Reference}
\label{classASPGrammarBaseVisitor}\index{ASPGrammarBaseVisitor$<$ Result $>$@{ASPGrammarBaseVisitor$<$ Result $>$}}


This class provides an empty implementation of IASPGrammar\+Visitor$<$\+Result$>$, which can be extended to create a visitor which only needs to handle a subset of the available methods.

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
This class provides an empty implementation of IASPGrammar\+Visitor$<$\+Result$>$, which can be extended to create a visitor which only needs to handle a subset of the available methods. 


\begin{DoxyTemplParams}{Template Parameters}
{\em Result} & The return type of the visit operation.\\
\hline
\end{DoxyTemplParams}
